SEARCH
Package main.java.game.model

Class PlayerModel

java.lang.Object
main.java.game.model.PlayerModel
Direct Known Subclasses:
PlayerComputerModel
public class PlayerModel extends Object
Represents a player in the game, managing their deck, hand, and score.

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayerModel

      public PlayerModel(int gameId)
      Constructs a PlayerModel with a given ID. Initializes the score to 0 and creates an empty deck.
      Parameters:
      gameId - The unique identifier of the player.

  • Method Details

    • giveCardInDeck

      public void giveCardInDeck(CardModel card)
      Adds a card to the player's deck.
      Parameters:
      card - The card to be added to the deck.

    • giveCardInHand

      public void giveCardInHand(CardModel card)
      Places a card into the player's hand.
      Parameters:
      card - The card to be placed in hand.

    • switchCard

      public CardModel switchCard(int cardPosition, CardModel newCard)
      Replaces a card in the player's deck with a new card and returns the old card.
      Parameters:
      cardPosition - The position of the card to be replaced.
      newCard - The new card to be placed in the deck.
      Returns:
      The card that was replaced.

    • getCardInHand

      public CardModel getCardInHand()
      Retrieves the card currently in the player's hand.
      Returns:
      The card in the player's hand.

    • setCardInDeck

      public void setCardInDeck(int position, CardModel cardModel)
      Sets a card at a specific position in the player's deck.
      Parameters:
      position - The index in the deck where the card should be placed.
      cardModel - The card to place in the deck.

    • clearCardInHand

      public void clearCardInHand(CardGameModel cardGameModel)
      Clears the card currently in the player's hand and discards it. The card is passed to the discard method of the CardGameModel.
      Parameters:
      cardGameModel - The CardGameModel instance used to discard the card.

    • clearCard

      public void clearCard(CardGameModel cardGameModel)
      Clears all the cards from the player's deck and discards them. It also clears the player's hand
      Parameters:
      cardGameModel - The CardGameModel instance used to discard each card from the deck and hand.

    • clearHand

      public void clearHand(CardGameModel cardGameModel)
      Clears the card in the player's hand and sends it to the discard pile.
      Parameters:
      cardGameModel - The game model used to access the discard mechanism.

    • addScore

      public boolean addScore(int newScore)
      Adds a given score to the player's total score.
      Parameters:
      newScore - The score to be added.
      Returns:
      True if the total score exceeds 50, otherwise false.

    • resetScore

      public void resetScore()
      Resets the player's score to 0.

    • getScore

      public int getScore()
      Retrieves the player's current score.
      Returns:
      The current score of the player.

    • getCardInDeck

      public ArrayList<CardModel> getCardInDeck()
      Returns:
      the list of card in the deck

    • getCardInDeck

      public CardModel getCardInDeck(int position)
      Parameters:
      position - the position of the wanted card
      Returns:
      the card at `position` in the deck

    • getScoreInDeck

      public int getScoreInDeck()
      Calculates the total score of the cards in the player's deck.
      Returns:
      The sum of points from all cards in the deck.

    • getUsername

      public String getUsername()
      getter for Player's username
      Returns:
      The username of the player

      Retrieves the unique game identifier of the player.
      Returns:
      The unique game ID of the player.

      getter for isReady
      Returns:
      boolean to check if the user is ready
